text: Best Thai food at affordable price. Portion is huge. The mixed vegetables brought me directly back to bkk street. Tried a few others such as garlic pork, garlic chicken, pad thai, kang Kung, po piah.. all yummy! Strongly recommend!
Ok Thai food. The garlic pork was a bit salty for me. Pineapple rice decent.

Affordable pricing, generous portions and tasty food.

Glad to have found this gem in a food court. Seems pretty popular with families as it‚Äôs easy to order a few dishes to share. Average pricing was about $7.

We each got our own mains and shared a tom yam soup. Everything tasted decent for its price point and however, the tom yam soup tastes slightly different (in a good way) to the usual ones. It has a slow burn effect, i.e you feel the warmth in your tummyüå∂Ô∏è

Highly recommend if you‚Äôre around the area!
Poor service. Paid for my order. Missed my order. Did not apologise at all.

Not the first time buying from this shop.
Food taste nice.
But what is this? So disappointed.
I think I would need an answer.
